casebody.data:
Melissa Elaine KLEIN, et vir, petitioners,
v.
OREGON BUREAU OF LABOR AND INDUSTRIES. No. 18-547. Supreme Court of the United States June 17, 2019.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Oregon. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the Court of Appeals of Oregon for further consideration in light of Masterpiece Cakeshop, Ltd. v. Colorado Civil Rights Comm'n, 584 U.S. ----, 138 S.Ct. 1719, 201 L.E.2d 35 (2018).
